                                                        <h1 class="mec-single-title">Summer Camp – Coral Springs</h1>
                
                
				<div class="mec-single-event-description mec-events-content">		<div data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="4854" class="elementor elementor-4854" data-elementor-post-type="mec-events">
						<section class="has_eae_slider elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-a09d047 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default" data-eae-slider="78212" data-id="a09d047" data-element_type="section">
						<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
					<div class="has_eae_slider elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-8aa976c" data-eae-slider="605" data-id="8aa976c" data-element_type="column">
			<div class="elementor-widget-wrap elementor-element-populated">
						<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-42f1d71 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="42f1d71" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
				<div class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p><span style="color: #000000;">“Summer Explorers Camp: Ignite, Inspire, Imagine!”</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Welcome to a summer adventure like no other! Join us at the “Summer Explorers Camp,” where fun meets learning in an exhilarating blend of creativity, discovery, and friendship. This immersive camp is designed for young minds eager to explore, grow, and make lasting memories.</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Ignite Your Imagination:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Embark on a journey of creativity and innovation! Our camp offers a diverse range of hands-on activities, including arts and crafts, science experiments, and interactive workshops.</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Inspire a Love for Learning:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Learning has never been this much fun! Engage in dynamic educational sessions (tutoring sessions available upon request) that seamlessly blend knowledge with excitement. Discover the joy of learning in a supportive and encouraging environment that sparks curiosity and fosters a lifelong love for education.</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Imagine the Possibilities:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Unleash your potential through a variety of team-building activities and games! Develop leadership skills, boost confidence, and make friends for life. Our carefully curated program includes team challenges, and collaborative projects that encourage teamwork, problem-solving, and creative thinking. The possibilities are endless when you imagine together!</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Who Can Join:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">The Summer Explorers Camp is open to children aged 5-14 who are eager to embark on an exciting journey of fun and learning.</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Registration Details:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Secure your spot in the Summer Explorers Camp and make this summer one to remember! Limited spaces available, so register early to guarantee your place.</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;"> Date and Time:</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 1: June 17-21</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 2: June 24-28</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 3: July 1-5 (No camp on July 4th)</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 4: July 8-12</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 5: July 15-19</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 6: July 22-26</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 7: July 29 – August 2</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week 8: August 5-9</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;">Time: 9 AM – 2 PM</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;">Drop-in rate: $75 a day</span><br /><span style="color: #000000;">Week rate: $275 per week</span></p><p><span style="color: #000000;">Join us for a summer filled with laughter, discovery, and growth at the “Summer Explorers Camp: Ignite, Inspire, Imagine!” Let the adventure begin!</span></p>								</div>
				</div>
				<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-545185e elementor-align-left elementor-widget elementor-widget-button" data-id="545185e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="button.default">

									<span class="elementor-button-text">Register</span>
					</span>
					</a>
				</div>

					<script>
				const lazyloadRunObserver = () => {
					const lazyloadBackgrounds = document.querySelectorAll( `.e-con.e-parent:not(.e-lazyloaded)` );
					const lazyloadBackgroundObserver = new IntersectionObserver( ( entries ) => {
						entries.forEach( ( entry ) => {
							if ( entry.isIntersecting ) {
								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {
									lazyloadBackground.classList.add( 'e-lazyloaded' );
								}
								lazyloadBackgroundObserver.unobserve( entry.target );
							}
						});
					}, { rootMargin: '200px 0px 200px 0px' } );
					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
						lazyloadBackgroundObserver.observe( lazyloadBackground );
					} );
				};
				const events = [
					'DOMContentLoaded',
					'elementor/lazyload/observe',
				];
				events.forEach( ( event ) => {
					document.addEventListener( event, lazyloadRunObserver );
				} );
			</script>

					e.preventDefault();

					const action = $(this).data("action");
					const target = $(this).data("target");

					if (action === "modal") {
						if (target) {
